<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105959</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105959</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201852</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tobacco on Screen </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tabak auf Bildschirm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tabac sur l'écran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tabaco na tela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tabacco sullo schermo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καπνός στην οθόνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tabaco en la pantalla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will analyze the use of tobacco in films, its placement and purpose.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer analysieren den Gebrauch des Tabaks
in den Filmen, in seiner Plazierung und im Zweck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants analyseront l'utilisation du tabac 
dans les films, son placement et le but.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes analisarão o uso do tabaco nas 
películas, na sua colocação e na finalidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi analizzeranno l'uso di tabacco in 
pellicole, nella relativa disposizione e nello scopo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα αναλύσουν τη χρήση του καπνού στις 
ταινίες, την τοποθέτηση και το σκοπό του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes analizarán el uso del tabaco en 
películas, su colocación y propósito.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201852</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105959</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tobacco-on-screen</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
